page.shortlink: api client api a5 listbox populate method

argument.name: keepValue
argument.description: Whether or not to keep the previous value of the list or reset it.

argument.name: animation
argument.description: What animation to perform. To not animate pass in false. If a string is passed in the value can be either "next" or "prev". If an object is passed in then the object must contain "type" which can be "next" or "prev" and "duration" for custom duration of the animation. This will swap the data displayed with a slide animation based on the specified flow (in A5.ListBox.animation.swap.flow).

argument.name: fireEvent
argument.description: Whether or not to fire the populate events.

page.description: Populate the list with new data.
